publications.title: Robust Test-Time Adaptation in Dynamic Scenarios
publications.authors: Longhui Yuan, Binhui Xie, Shuang Li
publications.introduction: We propose a practical test-time adaptation setting that takes the distribution change and correlative sampling into account simultaneously, and lunch a novel robust test-time adaptation method to tackle problems in PTTA.

publications.title: Evolving Standardization for Continual Domain Generalization over Temporal Drift
publications.authors: Mixue Xie, Shuang Li, Longhui Yuan, Chi Harold Liu, Zehui Dai
publications.introduction: We propose the Continual Domain Generalization over Temporal Drift (CDGTD) to addresses the challenge of gradually shifting data distributions over time and lunch an Evolving Standardization (EvoS) method to tackle problems of CDGTD.

publications.title: Towards Fewer Annotations: Active Learning via Region Impurity and Prediction Uncertainty for Domain Adaptive Semantic Segmentation
publications.authors: Binhui Xie, Longhui Yuan, Shuang Li, Chi Harold Liu, Xinjing Cheng
publications.introduction: A region-based acquisition strategy for DA Segmentation queries image regions that are both diverse in spatial adjacency and uncertain in prediction output.

publications.title: Active Learning for Domain Adaptation: An Energy-based Approach
publications.authors: Binhui Xie, Longhui Yuan, Shuang Li, Chi Harold Liu, Xinjing Cheng, Guoren Wang
publications.introduction: A new perspective to select a highly informative subset of unlabeled target data under domain shift via exploiting free energy biases across domains.

preprints.title: Generalized Robust Test-Time Adaptation in Continuous Dynamic Scenarios
preprints.authors: Shuang Li, Longhui Yuan, Binhui Xie, Tao Yang
preprints.introduction: We extend our preliminary work RoTTA to a generalized approach, i.e., GRoTTA.

preprints.title: Few Clicks Suffice: Active Test-Time Adaptation for Semantic Segmentation
preprints.authors: Longhui Yuan, Shuang Li, Zhuo He, Binhui Xie
preprints.introduction: We propose the active test-time adaptation for semantic segmentation setup and launch a simple but effective framework, i.e., ATASeg.
